name: Color Combiner
description:
Combine the color of your cursor with the colors of the circle. 
The colors are always changing with every color you match sothat you cant remember a specific pattern. It all depends on your eyevision and how fast you can click.  
Try to beat your own personal highscore or compete against your friends

Disclaimer: This game ist NOT colorblind friendly. If you are colorblind you will probably not enjoy this game at all because it´s all about matching the right colors.
